languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} (6): первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно всем целям, а также 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

traits.locale_text: Devastating 6: The first use of an attacking Navigator power does not set the attacking Navigator powers on cooldown. The second use of a Navigator power will deal an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 direct damage to the Navigator. +10 Willpower +5 Perception

Devastating 6: The first use of an attacking Navigator power does not set the attacking Navigator powers on cooldown. The second use of a Navigator power will deal an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 direct damage to the Navigator. +10 Willpower +5 Perception

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g} (6): Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlich +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und dem Navigator 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g} 6: Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlich +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und dem Navigator 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu. <indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} <indent=5%>+5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} (6) : à chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du Navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du Navigateur au cours du même tour inflige +6 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires à toutes les cibles et 6 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} au Navigateur. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} 6 : à chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du Navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du Navigateur au cours du même tour inflige +6 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires à toutes les cibles et 6 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} au Navigateur. <indent=5%>+10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} <indent=5%>+5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}（6）：每回合首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成6点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此外，导航者本人也会承受6点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}6：首次使用攻击性的导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。第二次使用导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成6点伤害，导航者本人也会承受6点直击伤害。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

languages.original_text: Devastating 6: The first use of an attacking Navigator power does not set the attacking Navigator powers on cooldown. The second use of a Navigator power will deal an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 direct damage to the Navigator. +10 Willpower +5 Perception

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastación{/g} (6): El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige +6 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a todos los objetivos y 6 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al navegante. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastación{/g} 6: El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige +6 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a todos los objetivos y 6 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al navegante. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} (6): первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно всем целям, а также 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Настойчивость{/g} 6: после первого использования атакующей силы навигатора не требуется период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g}. Второе использование силы навигатора наносит +6 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 6 прямого урона самому навигатору. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Настойчивость{/g} 6: после первого использования атакующей силы навигатора не требуется период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g}. Второе использование силы навигатора наносит +6 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 6 прямого урона самому навигатору. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}廃滅{/g}(6)：ターン毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+6、および航宙士に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}6を与える。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+10増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+5増加
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}廃滅{/g}6：ターン毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+6、および航宙士に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}6を与える。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+10増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+5増加
